Jogo excelente!!!
Jogo perfeito para jogar com um amigo, missÃµes muito diferenciadas e sempre desafiantes.
Pretty good game for its age

portal 2, un gran juego con bastante humor, una historia muy buena y el modo cooperativo es lo que marca este juego y es muy entretenido, te obliga a pensar mucho junto a tus amigos por no decir uno solo.
los graficos estan bien para su epoca no es que sea lo mejor pero es un juego simple resolver cada sala con el ingenio, a algunos les costara mas que a otros, pero hay esta la gracia de pensar todo con claridad y no hacer algo erroneo, aunque te lo pasas una vez y ya no hay complicacion pero despues de eso es muy recomendado el juego, tiene unas 6-8hs de juego en su historia principal y recomendaria comprarlo en una oferta.

Just completed this fantastic game with a huge smile on my face. Not only is this a brilliant and well thought out puzzle game, it is, without a shadow of doubt, one of the funniest and best written games I have ever been fortunate to play, thenks in part to Steven Merchant.

Buy this game NOW if you have'nt already got it.
Other than some poor storytelling elements, Portal 2 is able to surpass the original in almost every way!
100% Worth it
De quoi passer des bons moments , surtout en co-op!
One of the best narrative driven games I've played. Good puzzles, good story and iconic characters.

I love this game. The main story is great for introducing new players with little knowledge of the mechanics. Lots of easter eggs too which is nice <3. The best part tho is the chamber editor. You can make your own chambers and publish them to the fantastic community. Creators are really clever these days. I definitely recommend this game to anyone who can afford it!

[h1]PRO:[/h1]

Il gioco piÃ¹ bello mai giocato nella mia vita, la storia, gli fps, gli extra,.. questo gioco Ã¨ qualcosa che una volta giocato vi cambierÃ  la vita. Ancora non ho provato la modalitÃ  multiplayer, ma ho completato la storia e ho fatto un livello con il level editor integrato nel gioco, quindi non necessariamente bisogna utilizzare Hammer come in altri giochi Source.


[h1]Contro:[/h1]

Questo gioco non ha contro, perÃ² ho riscontrato un grossissimo problema: Ogni volta che chiudo il gioco, c'Ã¨ un 50% di possibilitÃ  che di elimini l'esecutibile "portal2.exe", non ho ancora capito perchÃ¨, ma mi fa passare un po' di tempo nella verifica dei file.

9/10

This game is a classic, and if you haven't picked it up yet, there's no time like the present. It's mechanics are both simple and complex in that the controls are basic but the puzzles can become quite complicated. The story is not overly complicated, but is nontheless interesting and the characters are witty, funny, and memorable. You need to like puzzle games, however, and if those aren't your type of games, you might not like this no matter how good the characters or story.

Another one of Valve's in-house greats. With GLaDOS constant teasing and ever changing and ever challenging puzzles, the game gets better the farther you get in. The co-op is wonderfully designed and besides previous doubts, works beautifully. This game is a beauty of both game design and control layouts. I rate 10/10.
